title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 53.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 53.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part apply to the Shaupeneak Ridge

Cooperative Recreation Area (area) in the Town of Esopus in Ulster County. Included within the area are lands owned by Scenic Hudson Land Trust, Inc., for
which a Fish and Wildlife Cooperative Agreement entered into pursuant to

Environmental Conservation Law, section 11-0501 is in effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
53.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
